Text: can u give me any link or instructions to burn this?  tnx
You propably have to transfer it to your Xbox HDD.

This is done by spoofing the directory structure of the hard disk on the disk drive:

/Content/0000000000000000/*TitleID*/000D0000/*XBLA Game*

Use CD-R or DVD-R and burn in UDF format, multiple games on one disc should work.

Sourcr: http://forums.xbox-scene.com/index.php?showtopic=660565&pid=4338513&mode=threaded&show=&st=&#entry4338513

Lycka till!
